data.comment: The match has started at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Manuel Palacios scores to make it 0-1 at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to Gangwon.
In Chuncheon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Gangwon have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Gangwon.
Byung jin Park awards Pohang Steelers a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Pohang Steelers to take a throw-in in Gangwon territory.
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Gangwon.
In the minute 10, Pohang Steelers are whistled for offside.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Chuncheon.
In the minute 13, Goal kick for Pohang Steelers at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Gangwon's Cho Jae-wan gets in a shot on goal at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in the half of Gangwon.
In the minute 17, Ball safe as Gangwon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
In the minute 21, Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pohang Steelers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Im Chai-min (Gangwon) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 22, Pohang Steelers needs to be cautious. Gangwon have an attacking throw-in.
Pohang Steelers drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
In the minute 25, Great finish from Song Min-kyu to give Pohang Steelers a 0-2 lead.
Great play from Kang Sang-woo to set up the goal.
Free kick Gangwon.
In the minute 28, Ball goes out of play for a Pohang Steelers goal kick.
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Throw-in Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 32, Ko Mu-yeol of Gangwon gets in a strike, but is off target.
Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
Byung jin Park awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 33, Pohang Steelers are in shooting range from this free kick.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
Throw-in for Gangwon in the half of Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 36, In Chuncheon Gangwon attack through Kim Ji-hyeon. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Pohang Steelers goal kick.
In Chuncheon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Gangwon in the half of Pohang Steelers.
Kim Ji-hyeon of Gangwon smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 40, In Chuncheon Gangwon drive forward through Kim Ji-hyeon. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Gangwon.
Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
In the minute 41, Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Throw-in high up the field for Gangwon in Chuncheon.
Ball safe as Gangwon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Chuncheon.
In the minute 45, In Chuncheon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Byung jin Park signals a Gangwon throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Free kick Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 47, At Chuncheon Songam Sports Town, Shin Kwang-hoon has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Throw-in Gangwon.
Pohang Steelers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 49, Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers.
Free kick for Gangwon in the half of Pohang Steelers.
Corner awarded to Gangwon.
In the minute 51, Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Byung jin Park awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Gangwon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half?
In the minute 53, Free kick Gangwon.
Sin Se-gye gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gangwon.
Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
In the minute 56, Byung jin Park signals a throw-in for Gangwon, close to Pohang Steelers's area.
Gangwon are pushing forward but Cho Jae-wan's finish is wide of the goal.
Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in the half of Gangwon.
Aleksandar Palocevic is on a sub for Oh Beom-seok for Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Aleksandar Palocevic puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-3.
Song Min-kyu with an assist there.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Gangwon at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Chuncheon.
The home team replace Kim Seung-dae with Lee Hyeon-sik.
In the minute 67, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Pohang Steelers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 69, Pohang Steelers's Stanislav Iljutcenko gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gangwon defender.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
Lee Seung-mo (Pohang Steelers) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 69, Pohang Steelers's Kang Sang-woo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Byung jin Park awards Gangwon a goal kick.
Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
In the minute 71, Pohang Steelers's Aleksandar Palocevic misses with an attempt on goal.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Gangwon's Lee Yeong-jae breaks free at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Pohang Steelers at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Byung-Soo Kim (Gangwon) is making a second substitution, with Lee Yeong-jae replacing Shin Kwang-hoon.
Corner awarded to Gangwon.
Byung jin Park awards Pohang Steelers a goal kick.
In the minute 75, In Chuncheon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 75, The away team have replaced Manuel Palacios with Lee Kwang-hyeok. This is the second substitution made today by Gi Dong Kim.
Can Pohang Steelers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gangwon's half?
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers close to the penalty box.
In the minute 77, Byung jin Park awards the home team a throw-in.
Pohang Steelers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Gangwon in the half of Pohang Steelers.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers.
Kim Kwang-seok for Pohang Steelers has been booked by Byung jin Park and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for Gangwon at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Cho Jae-wan for Gangwon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Chuncheon.
In the minute 84, Gangwon will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Pohang Steelers.
Pohang Steelers drive upfield and Choi Yeong-jun gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gangwon defender.
Kim Yeong-bin (Gangwon) has received a yellow card from Byung jin Park.
In the minute 85, Throw-in Pohang Steelers.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Lee Seung-mo (Pohang Steelers) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 86, Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Gangwon drives forward and Cho Jae-wan gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Gangwon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pohang Steelers's half?
Shim Dong-un for Pohang Steelers drives towards goal at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
Byung jin Park blows to end the match. The final score is 0-3.
Shim Dong-un is replacing Song Min-kyu for Pohang Steelers at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
